title: Palaeolithic man
brief_description: Illustrates the way of life of palaeolithic hunters and food gatherers, based on three sources of evidence that remain today - weapons and implements found near their primitive hearths, drawings from European cave settlements and the nomadic lives of some Australian First Nations peoples.
